style: Add 4 spaces (an extra level of indentation) to distinguish arguments from the rest.
code:
def long_function_name(
        var_one, var_two, var_three,
        var_four):
    print(var_one)
label: correct

style: Hanging indents should add a level.
code:
foo = long_function_name(
    var_one, var_two,
    var_three, var_four)
label: correct
